text: The Archangel () is a 1969 Italian comedy movie directed by Giorgio Capitani and starring Vittorio Gassman, Pamela Tiffin, Irina Demick, Adolfo Celi, Lauren Antonelli, Carlo Delle Piane, Tom Felleghy, Carlo Pisacane. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1969 comedy movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Giorgio Capitani
title: The Archangel
